section.title: Next steps
section.para: Your OpenStack environment now includes the dashboard.
After you install and configure the dashboard, you can complete the following tasks:

listitem.para: Provide users with a public IP address, a username, and a password so they can access the dashboard through a web browser. In case of any SSL certificate connection problems, point the server IP address to a domain name, and give users access.
Customize your dashboard. For details, see .
Set up session storage. For derails, see .
To use the VNC client with the dashboard, the browser must support HTML5 Canvas and HTML5 WebSockets.
For details about browsers that support noVNC, see README and browser support.
